// Get libraries
const Moment = global.get('moment');
const MomentRange = global.get('momentrange');
const moment = MomentRange.extendMoment(Moment);
var lodash = global.get('lodash');
var _ = global.get('underscore');
var BSON = global.get('bson');
var ObjectID = BSON.ObjectID;
var accounting = global.get('accounting'); 
var accountingoptions = {	symbol : "€",	decimal : ".", 	thousand: " ", 	precision : 0, 	format: "%s %v"}; // example = Output = accounting.formatMoney(Number, accountingoptions );
var mongodbTools = global.get('mongodbTools');

// msg.resultGrouped.test = []

var Childs = [ {
                    name: "Create project",
                    label: "Create project",
                    button: true,
                    group : false,
                    buttonType: "success",
                    iconName: global.get("icons.fas.create"),
                    // iconUrl: 'https://revotio.nl/webpages/images/icons/Add.svg',
                    iconState: true,
                    organization_id : new ObjectID(msg.RevotioData.PostData.gadgetData.organization_id),
                    inner:[]
                },
               ]
msg.test = []

if (msg.result.length > 0){
    Childs.push({
                        name: "Projects",
                        label: "Projects",
                        group : true,
                        // iconName: global.get("icons.fas.project"),
                        iconState: true,
                        iconUrl: global.get("DomainProperties.prodUrl") + "/files/SystemFiles/icons/icon_rocket.svg",
                        filePath :global.get("icons.images.project") ,
                        bubble: msg.payload.length,
                        organization_id: new ObjectID(msg.RevotioData.PostData.gadgetData.organization_id),
                        redirect : false,
                        inner: []
                })


    // groupedProjects = lodash.groupBy(lodash.orderBy(msg.payload, ["projectData.name"], ["asc"]), "projectData.Department");

    _.each(lodash.groupBy(lodash.orderBy(msg.result, ["projectData.name"], ["asc"]), "projectData.Department"), function(DepartmentItem, DepartmentItemID){

                    settingsObj = {} ;
                    _.each(msg.settings, function(settingsItem,settingsItemIndex ){
                        if (String(settingsItem._id) === String(DepartmentItemID)){
                           settingsObj =  settingsItem
                        }
                    })
                    
            if (Object.keys(settingsObj).length > 0 ){
                
                 if (lodash.findIndex(Childs[1].inner, {name: settingsObj.name}) < 0){
                    
                    Childs[1].inner.push({              
                                    name: settingsObj.name,
                                    label: settingsObj.name,
                                    group : true,
                                    iconName: global.get("icons.fas.open"),
                                    // iconUrl: 'https://revotio.nl/webpages/Icons/Plus.svg', 
                                    iconState: true,
                                    bubble: DepartmentItem.length,
                                    redirect : false,
                                    // Page: 'project overview',
                                    // organization_id : new ObjectID(Item.organization_id),
                                    // project_id :  new ObjectID(Item.project_id),
                                    inner: []})
                    
                }
                
                DeptIndex  = lodash.findIndex(Childs[1].inner, {name: settingsObj.name})


                _.each(DepartmentItem, function(projectItem, projectItemIndex){
                                
                                if (projectItem.projectData.funding_scheme_data.hasOwnProperty("complexity_level") === false  || projectItem.projectData.funding_scheme_data.complexity_level  === "basic"){
                                    
                                    Childs[1].inner[DeptIndex].inner.push({
                                            name: projectItem.projectData.name,
                                            label: projectItem.projectData.name,
                                            group : true,
                                            // iconName: global.get("icons.fas.project"),
                                            iconUrl: global.get("DomainProperties.prodUrl") + "/files/SystemFiles/icons/icon_rocket.svg",
                                             filePath :global.get("icons.images.project") ,
                                            // iconUrl: 'https://revotio.nl/webpages/Icons/Airplane.svg', 
                                            iconState: true,
                                            bubble: '',
                                            organization_id : new ObjectID(projectItem.organization_id),
                                            project_id :  new ObjectID(projectItem.project_id),
                                            redirect : false,
                                            inner: [
                                                  {              
                                                    name: "Open " + projectItem.projectData.name,
                                                    label: "Open " + projectItem.projectData.name,
                                                    group : false,
                                                    iconName: global.get("icons.fas.open"),
                                                    // iconUrl: 'https://revotio.nl/webpages/Icons/Plus.svg', 
                                                    iconState: true,
                                                    bubble: '',
                                                    redirect : true,
                                                    Page: 'project overview',
                                                    organization_id : new ObjectID(projectItem.organization_id),
                                                    project_id :  new ObjectID(projectItem.project_id),
                                                    inner: []},
                                                {               
                                                        State: "Inactive",
                                                        name: "Participants",
                                                        label: "Participants",
                                                        group : true,
                                                        iconName: global.get("icons.fas.participants"),
                                                        // iconUrl: 'https://revotio.nl/webpages/Icons/Flag.svg', 
                                                        iconState: true,
                                                        bubble: projectItem.projectParticipants,
                                                        redirect : false,
                                                        lazyload:  "participants",
                                                        organization_id : new ObjectID(projectItem.organization_id),
                                                        project_id :  new ObjectID(projectItem.project_id),
                                                        scope: '',
                                                        inner: [],
                                                        },
                                                {    
                                            name: "Reporting period management",
                                            label: "Reporting period management",
                                            group : true,
                                            iconName: global.get("icons.fas.calendar"),
                                            // iconUrl: 'https://revotio.nl/webpages/Icons/Checklist.svg', 
                                            iconState: true,
                                            bubble: '',
                                            redirect : true,
                                            Page: 'reporting_period',
                                            organization_id : new ObjectID(projectItem.organization_id),
                                            project_id :  new ObjectID(projectItem.project_id),
                                            // level : 'project',
                                            scope: '',
                                            inner: [],
                                                },
                                                {    
                                                    State: "Inactive",
                                                    name: "Work packages",
                                                    label: "Work packages",
                                                    group : true,
                                                    iconName: global.get("icons.fas.work_package"),
                                                    // iconUrl: 'https://revotio.nl/webpages/Icons/Checklist.svg', 
                                                    iconState: true,
                                                    bubble: projectItem.work_packages,
                                                    redirect : true,
                                                    Page: 'work_package_management',
                                                    // lazyload: "work packages",
                                                    organization_id : new ObjectID(projectItem.organization_id),
                                                    project_id :  new ObjectID(projectItem.project_id),
                                                    scope: '',
                                                    inner: [],
                                                    },
                                                    {    
                                                    State: "Inactive",
                                                    name: "Dashboard",
                                                    label: "Dashboard",
                                                    group : true,
                                                    iconName: global.get("icons.fas.dashboard"),
                                                    // iconUrl: 'https://revotio.nl/webpages/Icons/Checklist.svg', 
                                                    iconState: true,
                                                    bubble: 2,
                                                    redirect : true,
                                                    Page: 'project dashboard',
                                                    organization_id : new ObjectID(projectItem.organization_id),
                                                    project_id :  new ObjectID(projectItem.project_id),
                                                    scope: '',
                                                    inner: [
                                                        
                                                         {
                                                            name: "Transactions dashboard",
                                                            label: "Transactions dashboard",
                                                            group : false,
                                                            iconName: global.get("icons.fas.dashboard"),
                                                            iconState: true,
                                                            bubble: '',
                                                            Page: "transactions dashboard",
                                                            organization_id : new ObjectID(projectItem.organization_id),
                                                            project_id :  new ObjectID(projectItem.project_id),
                                                            redirect : true,
                                                            inner: []
                                                    },
                                                        {
                                                            name: "Project dashboard",
                                                            label: "Project dashboard",
                                                            group : false,
                                                            iconName: global.get("icons.fas.dashboard"),
                                                            iconState: true,
                                                            bubble: '',
                                                            Page: "project dashboard",
                                                            organization_id : new ObjectID(projectItem.organization_id),
                                                            project_id :  new ObjectID(projectItem.project_id),
                                                            redirect : true,
                                                            inner: []
                                                    }],
                        },
                        {    
                                                    State: 'Inactive',
                                                    name: "file management",
                                                    label: "File management",
                                                    group : true,
                                                    iconName: global.get("icons.fas.file_management"),
                                                    // iconUrl: 'https://revotio.nl/webpages/Icons/Checklist.svg', 
                                                    iconState: true,
                                                    bubble: '',
                                                    redirect : true,
                                                    Page: 'file management',
                                                    organization_id : new ObjectID(projectItem.organization_id),
                                                    project_id :  new ObjectID(projectItem.project_id),
                                                    level : 'project',
                                                    scope: '',
                                                    inner: [],
                        },
                        {    
                                            name: "Calendar",
                                            label: "Calendar",
                                            group : true,
                                            iconName: global.get("icons.fas.calendar"),
                                            // iconUrl: 'https://revotio.nl/webpages/Icons/Checklist.svg', 
                                            iconState: true,
                                            bubble: '',
                                            redirect : true,
                                            Page: 'calendar',
                                            organization_id : new ObjectID(projectItem.organization_id),
                                            project_id :  new ObjectID(projectItem.project_id),
                                            level : 'project',
                                            scope: '',
                                            inner: [],
                },
                     
                
                        ],
                                
                                
                            })
                                }
                                if (projectItem.projectData.funding_scheme_data.hasOwnProperty("complexity_level") === true  && projectItem.projectData.funding_scheme_data.complexity_level  === "advanced"){
                              
                                        //  _.each(DepartmentItem, function(projectItem, Index){
                                                        Childs[1].inner[DeptIndex].inner.push({
                                                                name: projectItem.projectData.name,
                                                                label: projectItem.projectData.name,
                                                                group : true,
                                                                // iconName: global.get("icons.fas.project"),
                                                                iconUrl: global.get("DomainProperties.prodUrl") + "/files/SystemFiles/icons/icon_rocket.svg",
